passage_text: [ 1 syll. kim, ki-m ] The baby girl name Kim is also used as a boy name, though it is more often a girl name. It is pronounced Kiy-M †. Forms of Kim include the name Cim, the Welsh Cym, the name Kem, the name Khim, the name Khime, the name Khym, the name Kima, the name Kimette, the name Kimm, and the name Kymme.

Kim /kim/ [1 syll.] as a girls' name (also used as boys' name Kim) is pronounced kim. It is of Old English origin, and the meaning of Kim is Cyneburg's field. Short form of Kimberly, used as an independent name since the mid 20th century, influenced by actresses Kim Novak and Kim Basinger. Kim is also a Korean name meaning gold. Actress Kim Catrall.

The name Kim is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Kim is: Noble or brave. English Meaning: The name Kim is an English baby name. In English the meaning of the name Kim is: Bold family. Bold kin. Famous Bearer: The hero of Rudyard Kipling's novel 'Kim'. Welsh Meaning: The name Kim is a Welsh baby name. In Welsh the meaning of the name Kim is: Chief of war. Leader.

Kim /kim/ [1 syll.] as a boys' name (also used as girls' name Kim) is pronounced kim. It is of English origin. Short form of Kim-names like Kimball or Kimberly. Kim is also a Korean surname meaning gold. Literary: name of the boy hero of Rudyard Kipling's novel Kim.
